title: Social Media Manager
job_overview:
We are looking for a Social Media Manager to Lead the brand’s social presence—develop strategy, create content, and foster community engagement across platforms.

Responsibilities

Define and implement social media strategy aligned with business goals

Create and schedule content (text, graphics, video)

Monitor platforms: respond to comments, messages, and mentions

Track engagement, reach, and ROI; refine tactics based on analytics

Stay up to date with platform trends and competitors

Qualifications

Proven experience managing social media accounts

Strong writing and basic visual or video production skills

Skilled with scheduling tools and analytics platforms

Organized, proactive, and trend-savvy

Apply
Send your resume, examples or links to past social work, and a brief note on why you’d be a great fit.
